keyword: how many calories in a spicy tuna roll
title: How Many Calories in a Spicy Tuna Roll?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a spicy tuna roll, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, carbs, fat, and simple tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Spicy Tuna Roll?
assumptions: Standard 6-8 piece sushi roll with raw tuna mixed with mayonnaise and sriracha, sushi rice, nori seaweed; no extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, portion size, rice type, mayo amount, and freshness of fish. Check with your sushi provider for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A typical spicy tuna roll contains about 320 calories with 15 g protein from the tuna.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use low-fat mayo in tuna mix

faqs.q: How many calories in a spicy tuna roll from a restaurant?
faqs.a: Typically 300-350 kcal, depending on size and ingredients.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a spicy tuna roll?
faqs.a: About 15 g, mainly from the fresh tuna.

faqs.q: Are spicy tuna rolls high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 600 mg due to soy sauce, seasonings, and rice.

faqs.q: How many carbs in a spicy tuna roll?
faqs.a: Roughly 40 g, mostly from the sushi rice.
It's a good source of omega-3s from tuna but watch sodium and added mayo fats.
